predicate.note: Frames file for 'enrich' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: add value

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Mr. Steinhardt, who runs about $1.7 billion for Steinhardt Partners, made his name as a gunslinging trader, *trace* moving in and out of stocks with agility -- *trace* enriching himself and his investment clients.
example.arg: *trace* -> *trace* -> Mr. Steinhardt, who runs about $1.7 billion for Steinhardt Partners,

example.name: with vitamins
example.text: John enriches any room he enters with his sparkling personality.

roleset.note: Arg2 will probably not occur very often. In financial usage it defaults to 'money'.
